scripts.postcss: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < src/styles.css | postcss --use cssnano --no-map > dist/styles.min.css
scripts.build:css: npm run sass && npm run postcss && cp -R src/svg dist/
scripts.build:html: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir dist --collapse-whitespace --file-ext html && replace 'styles.css' 'styles.min.css' dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
